@bevieberry Hi, B. Please refer to the details below.

NAIA Terminal 2 
For International flights - Baggage Assistance Counter
Telephone number: (+632) 84017779 / (+632) 8401-7697
Email: baggage_tracing@pal.com.ph
Hours of Operation: 0600H-2300H PH local time

Thank you.

data.text: @ChefSweetkei Hi Chef. As checked, Vietnam is not requiring negative COVID-19 test result. If you will be travelling as a tourist, you will need to have a travel and health insurance. For more info, visit: https://t.co/EDZWh9rHbA.

@mainegurl33 Hi, Mainegurl! We suggest to provide additional supporting documents for it :)

data.text:
@IamMeOxie You may check out this link to know more about the restricted items for transport and to view the safety and security reminders for baggage:

https://t.co/8DoKzlLYDP

Thank you.

(3/3)

@IamMeOxie Any LAGs carried in container larger than 100ml will not be accepted on the carry-on bags, even if the container is only partially filled. Larger containers must be placed in the check-in baggage.

(2/3)

@IamMeOxie Hi, passengers are allowed to carry LAGs (liquids, aerosols, and gels) in containers measuring 100 ml or less, which must be placed in transparent resealable plastic bags measuring approximately 20cm x 20cm. The capacity of the bag must not exceed 1 liter. 

(1/3)

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

urls.title: Choice Seats
urls.description: Get ready for a relaxing flight when you secure your preferred seats in advance. With Choice Seats Extra Legroom, get more personal space and room to stretch out. With Choice Seats Forward, be one of the first to disembark. These seats are located at the exit rows or bulkhead/cabin divider and allow passengers more space to stretch and rest their legs. These seats are in the front rows of the Economy cabin, except for seats at the exit rows or bulk heads. Passengers in Forward seats disembark the fastest

urls.title: Baggage assistance and tracking
urls.description: Please approach the Baggage Assistance Counter located at the Arrival Area for any concerns regarding your baggage. Immediately report any baggage incident that you may encounter during your arrival. NAIA Terminal 1 For International flights - Baggage Assistance Counter Telephone number: (+632) 8401-7697 Email: baggage_t1@pal.com.ph Hours of Operation: 0600H-2200H PH local time NAIA Terminal 2 For International flights - Baggage Assistance Counter Telephone number: (+632) 8401-7779 Email: baggage_tracing@p

data.text:
